short_description.title: Description for App: Bigcommerce. Do not translate "Bigcommerce."
short_description.value: Displays customer and order details from BigCommerce.

long_description.title: Long Description for App: Bigcommerce. Do not translate "Bigcommerce."
long_description.value:
The Zendesk Support for BigCommerce integration works to unite your business by displaying critical BigCommerce data alongside Zendesk Support ticket information.

### Improve customer satisfaction with better conversations

* Solve tickets faster by having access to relevant customer data from BigCommerce, such as billing, shipping, and order information, on Zendesk Support ticket pages.
* Easily navigate to  additional data in BigCommerce by simply clicking on Customer Numbers or Order Numbers in Zendesk Support.

By enabling this app, You agree to the [Built by Zendesk Terms of Use](https://www.zendesk.com/company/built-by-zendesk-agmt/).

installation_instructions.title: Installation Instructions for App: Bigcommerce. Do not translate "Bigcommerce."
installation_instructions.value: For installation instructions, see the [Installing the BigCommerce for Zendesk Support app](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660086) article.

label.title: URL of their BigCommerce online store to provide in the app settings
this is the BigCommerce username of the person setting up the zendesk app for the settings
this is the BigCommerce API token of the person setting up the zendesk app for the settings
This is the field in the app settings in their zendesk that will store the order ID of a bigcommerce order when they get a zendesk ticket

message.title: error message explanation text asking them to retry
message.value: Please try the previous action again.

no_notes.title: Placeholder message when no notes are present

id.title: Recent order table, this will list the 5 most recent order ids and their status

status.title: status table, this will list the 5 most recent order ids and their status

count.title: this is the total number of orders this customer has made

ticket.title: these are the details of the order for this customer, this is the title to a long list of info about the order

subtotal_inc_tax.title: subtotal (a number will be displayed there)

total_inc_tax.title: subtotal (a number will be displayed there)

date_created.title: this is the date the order was put through

date_shipped.title: this is the date the order was shipped
